name: Classic Shmup Game Mockup Jam Entry
name_original: Classic Shmup Game Mockup Jam Entry
description:
My entry for the Game Mockup Jam. Consists of a single looping gif and a short victory theme for this hypothetical shoot 'em up.

I used this jam to practice Aseprite, which I really enjoyed using it.  I'm also very new to using Ableton. I have a lot to learn, and I'm excited to practice that too.

Included in the zip is the looping gif and the victory theme, along with their respective project files.
